    Alcohol consumption and the risks of adult diseases

    alcohol-disease-risks.Rmd

    Background

    The latest versions of the dose-response curve linking alcohol consumption to disease are available in a short report (Angus et al. 2018). This vignette does not aim to reproduce that report - instead this vignette explains how the risk functions within the tobalcepi code can be accessed and used.

    References

    Angus, Colin, M Henney, L Webster, and Duncan Gillespie. 2018. Alcohol-Attributable Diseases and Dose-Response Curves for the Sheffield Alcohol Policy Model Version 4.0. Book. https://doi.org/10.15131/shef.data.6819689.v1.
